taskpromptIds.prompt: Upload clips of Twyne building the rocket and launching into the sky.
Share which part of the snail's journey inspires you most.
Show key moments from the snail's whimsical rocket launch.
Highlight the snail soaring in the sky.
Capture moments of the snail meeting colorful characters.
Show the obstacles faced during the journey.
Celebrate the successful adventure and inspire viewers.
Display credits and thank viewers for watching.
